channel.title: Code4it.dev on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Code4it.dev on .NET Ramblings

item.title: C# Tip: Path.Combine and Path.Join are similar but way different.
item.description: When composing the path to a folder or file location, the Path class can come in handy. Path.Join and Path.Combine may look similar, but their behavior differ in an unexpected way. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/csharptips/path-combine-vs-path-join/

item.title: Getting started with Load testing with K6 on Windows 11
item.description: Can your system withstand heavy loads? You can answer this question by running Load Tests. Maybe, using K6 as a free tool. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/blog/k6-load-testing/
